languages.text: "Доверься мне. Я заберу саркофаг с артефактом и доставлю его туда, где его смогут уничтожить без вреда для окружающих".
"Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."
languages.original_text: "Доверься мне. Я заберу саркофаг с артефактом и доставлю его туда, где его смогут уничтожить без вреда для окружающих".

traits.locale_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artifact and deliver it to those who can destroy it harmlessly."
"Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artifact and deliver it to those who can destroy it harmlessly."
"Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artifact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."
"Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artifact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."
"Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

languages.text: 「案ずるな。アーティファクトが入っている棺は、必ず安全に破壊できる者に渡そう」
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: 「案ずるな。遺物が入っている棺は、必ず安全に破壊できる者に渡そう」

languages.text: “相信我，我会把保存炸弹的棺柩交给专业人员，让他们安全地把它销毁。”
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: “相信我，我会把保存炸弹的棺柩交给专业人员，让他们安全地把它销毁。”

languages.text: «Confíe en mí. Llevaré el sarcófago que alberga el artefacto a manos de quienes pueden destruirlo de forma segura».
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: «Confíe en mí. Llevaré el sarcófago que alberga el artefacto a manos de quienes pueden destruirlo de forma segura».

languages.text: « Faites-moi confiance. J'apporterai le sarcophage contenant l'artefact à qui pourra le détruire en toute sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: « Faites-moi confiance. J'apporterai le sarcophage contenant l'artefact à qui pourra le détruire en toute sécurité. »

languages.text: "Vertraut mir. Ich werde den Sarcophagus mit dem Artefakt zu Leuten bringen, die beides sicher zerstören können."
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: "Vertraut mir. Ich werde den Sarcophagus mit dem Artefakt zu Leuten bringen, die beides sicher zerstören können."

languages.text: "Bana güven. Eserin bulunduğu lahdi alacak ve onu güvenle yok edebilecek kişilere teslim edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Trust me. I will take the sarcophagus that holds the artefact and deliver it to those who can destroy it safely."

traits.locale_text: "Bana güven. Eserin bulunduğu lahiti alacağım ve onu güvenle yok edebilecek kişilere teslim edeceğim."
